title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Programming Fundamentals Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: A mobile-optimized microlearning course in a smartphone-centric environment, with the core goal of sustaining engagement through automated instructional design. Structured around summative assessments, emphasizing problem-solving skills via learner interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can implement simple algorithms using basic programming syntax (variables, conditionals, loops).
Learners can achieve over 80% weekly assignment completion rates through automated feedback provided in mobile environments.
Learners can analyze peers' code and suggest at least three improvement points via a peer review system.

resources: Programming Practice Platform with Automated Grading
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
